Description: Specifies the temporal matching method for hydrogen production and renewable energy.
Indicates whether spatial matching is applied for hydrogen production.
If true, ensures renewable electricity is equal to the amount required for additional hydrogen export compared to the reference case without hydrogen export.
Defines the allowable excess renewable energy for hydrogen production.
Indicates whether the network is a reference case for additionality calculations. It is relavant only if ``additionality`` is true.
Specifies whether to remove hydrogen load from the network in the reference case. It is relevant only if ``is_reference`` is true.
Path to the reference case network for additionality calculation. It is relevant only if ``addtionality`` is true and ``is_reference`` is false.
If true, forces renewable electricity to match hydrogen export and country electricity load. If false, renewable electricity is only matched to hydrogen export.
